name: Kitty the Destroyer
description:
Entry for the "One Minute Game Jam #4"

You're a Cat named Kitty! And your whole propose in life is to destroy the things your human leaves around.

Your main mission is to drop to the floor 4 items: A Laptop, a Glass of Water, an empty Flower Pot and a Photo Framed.

But you only have a minute before your human comes back! And to make it more challenging, you can't touch the floor!

Controls:

W/S  = Move the cat

A/D = Rotate the cat

Space = Jump

Notes:

I'm not a 3D animator and I couldn't find a decent animation for the cat, so it looks like it's an early N64 game.
